resources.string: TxRx Widget provides the total number of bytes received through all network interfaces. Download and upload bitrates are being reported every second to the notification bar so you are always aware of your bandwidth usage.
Add the widget from Menu -> Add -> Widget. The widget takes one tile from screen and behaves like button. Toggle notifier on and off by tapping the widget.
Special thanks to Krvarma\'s Android samples helping me to get started with Android SDK! Hope you like the widget!
